import React from 'react'; import { calculerMoyenne } from '../../utils/noteCalculator'; import { getCouleurEvaluation } from '../../utils/colors'; const EvaluationCoach = ({ coachNom, coachId, evaluation, setEvaluation, onSave, bgColor = '#ff8800', borderColor = '#ff8800' }) => { const moyenne = calculerMoyenne(evaluation); return (
{coachId === '1' ? '‚öΩ' : 'üéØ'}

{coachNom}

{coachId === '1' ? 'Coach principal' : 'Coach adjoint'}

üèãÔ∏è Entra√Ænements
Organisation, pertinence, int√©r√™t des s√©ances
setEvaluation({...evaluation, entrainements: e.target.value})} style={{width: '100%', padding: '0.75rem', border: '2px solid #fbbf24', borderRadius: '0.5rem', fontSize: '1.25rem', textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: 'bold', background: '#ffffff', color: '#92400e'}} />
‚öΩ Coaching Match
Tactique, changements, lecture du jeu
setEvaluation({...evaluation, coaching: e.target.value})} style={{width: '100%', padding: '0.75rem', border: '2px solid #3b82f6', borderRadius: '0.5rem', fontSize: '1.25rem', textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: 'bold', background: '#ffffff', color: '#1e40af'}} />
ü§ù Relation Joueurs
Communication, √©coute, motivation
setEvaluation({...evaluation, relation: e.target.value})} style={{width: '100%', padding: '0.75rem', border: '2px solid #22c55e', borderRadius: '0.5rem', fontSize: '1.25rem', textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: 'bold', background: '#ffffff', color: '#166534'}} />
{moyenne && (
{moyenne}
Note globale moyenne
)}
); }; export default EvaluationCoach;
